Materials Checklist
■Stock Levels
■Drive-Thru Goals
■On-Going Promotions
■Promotional Products
■Happy Meal Toys

Washed Your Hands?
■Use McDonald's
hand soap. Wash
properly. Dry with
a paper towel.

Within 90s
■From first greeting the
customer to handing over the
finished order, it should
take less than 90s.

Within 45s
■From the time the customer's
car stops at the cashing
booth until the product is
handed over.

Within 3m 30s
■From the time the customer's
car enters the line until
they get their finished order,
it should take less than 3m
30s.
